subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On paper, Coach Charlie Weis’s 19-6 record and back-to-back appearances in B.C.S. games with Notre Dame may look like a promising start. But he knows better.
snippet: On paper, Coach Charlie Weis’s 19-6 record and back-to-back appearances in B.C.S. games with Notre Dame may look like a promising start. But he knows better.
